name: Bomb - 101
description:
Because of some uploading issues you'll have to download the zip file, unpack it and than you can run it. Now you can enjoy it :)

Aim:

You’re going to school to learn how to dismantle bombs, but the teacher of your course, “Bombs 101” is a bit crazy… He let you dismantle a bomb in 1 minute on your first day… But don’t worry, if you follow the instructions, you should be fine… I think…

Controls:

1) Number pad: enter a number and then click on the arrow button to confirm.

2) Buttons: click on the buttons in the right order.

3) Connect the wire: click on one of the letters on the left side and then one on the right side to connect both ends.

4) Cut the wire: click on the wire you want to cut.

5) yo can use the manual with the arrow keys on your keyboard.

! Hint !

I recommend using a sheet of paper while playing

PS: This is our first game!
